Package ohos.wearable.tile

Class TileAbility

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.app.AbilityContext
      • ohos.aafwk.ability.Ability
        • ohos.wearable.tile.TileAbility

  • public abstract class TileAbility
extends ohos.aafwk.ability.Ability
    A base class for implementing a tile.

    You need to implement onStatusChanged(ohos.wearable.tile.TileStatus) on a TileAbility object with the tile lifecycle state passed to return a TileEntity object as defined.

    Since:
    4

    • Field Detail

      • ACTION_REQUEST_UPDATE

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_REQUEST_UPDATE
        Indicates the action declared for the child class of TileAbility to request an update.

        This action is sent to the system when notifyDataChanged(ohos.app.Context,ohos.bundle.ElementName) is called on the child class of TileAbility to request the system to update this tile.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_TILE

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_TILE
        Indicates the action declared for the child class of TileAbility in the config.json file.

        After the system recognizes this action, the tile becomes selectable and can be added to the visible tile list.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_TILE_DEFAULT

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_TILE_DEFAULT
        Indicates the action declared for the child class of TileAbility in the config.json file for a tile to be displayed in the visible tile list by default.

        When an application is installed, the tile holding this application and declared with this action is automatically added to the visible tile list.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_CLASS_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_CLASS_NAME
        Indicates the name of the child class of TileAbility.

        The child class name is sent to the system when notifyDataChanged(ohos.app.Context,ohos.bundle.ElementName) is called on the child class of TileAbility to request the system to update this tile.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_PACKAGE_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_PACKAGE_NAME
        Indicates the package name of the child class of TileAbility.

        The package name is sent to the system when notifyDataChanged(ohos.app.Context,ohos.bundle.ElementName) is called on the child class of TileAbility to request the system to update this tile.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_TILE_IDS

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_TILE_IDS
        Indicates the tile ID.

        The tile ID is sent to the system when notifyDataChanged(ohos.app.Context,ohos.bundle.ElementName) is called on the child class of TileAbility to request the system to update this tile.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • onStatusChanged

        protected abstract TileEntity onStatusChanged​(TileStatus status)
        Called when the tile state changes.

        When the tile state changes, for example, the tile is selected or released, this callback is invoked to notify the TileAbility so that subsequent operations are performed based on TileStatus.

        Parameters:
        status - Indicates the tile state.
        Returns:
        Returns a TileEntity object if this tile is in the TileStatus#TILE_SELECTED or TileStatus#TILE_UPDATE state; returns a TileEntity object or null if the tile is in any other state.

      • isInRetailMode

        public final boolean isInRetailMode​()
        Checks whether the current system is in retail mode.

        For some applications, different tile content needs to be displayed in retail and non-retail modes. You need to call this method if retail mode-related services need to be processed.

        Returns:
        Returns true if the current system is in retail mode; returns false otherwise.

      • notifyDataChanged

        public final void notifyDataChanged​(ohos.app.Context context,
                                    ohos.bundle.ElementName elementName)
        Notifies the system of tile data changes.

        Upon receiving the notification, the tile system calls onStatusChanged(ohos.wearable.tile.TileStatus) to pass TileStatus#TILE_UPDATE to return a TileEntity object for updating.

        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the context object of the caller.
        elementName - Indicates the element name of the caller, which identifies a TileAbility object.
